title: Strengthening Customer Experience Practical Competencies: Ethical Considerations in Learning Analytics

context.prior_knowledge: Graduate-level foundational mathematics knowledge and basic understanding of digital learning tools
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three technical and legal procedures for protecting personal information when collecting learning analytics data.
Learners can interpret learning analytics results in a simulated environment and design personalized educational strategies.
Learners can apply an ethical framework to evaluate the balance between learner surveillance and transparency in VR-based scenarios.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
